description:
Hitting the slopes just got a lot more comfortable with these Women's Ski Targeted Cushion Over The Calf Socks. These Merino ski socks feature Smartwool’s most advanced Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability and our 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit. Plus, body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability. Take on your next ski day with confidence and comfort with these next-level performance socks.

  • Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
  • Wider welt for secure fit and comfort
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Women's specific fit: narrower heel and slimmer fit
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion OTC Socks - Women's
